fusion-multihybrid.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* fusion-multihybrid.cpp: multihybrid selection table: two-level (four-way)
00002    tournament selection.  Given four predictors P0, P1, P2 and P3, meta-predictor
00003    M01 uses tournament prediction (see fusion_mcfarling.cpp) to select one
00004    prediction from P0 and P1, meta-predictor M23 selects from P2 and P3, and a
00005    final meta-meta-predictor selects between M01 and M23.
00006    NOTE: The number of predictors must equal four. */
00007 /*
00008  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00009  */
00010 
00011 #define COMPONENT_NAME "multihybrid"
00012 
00013 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00014 if(!strcasecmp("multihybrid",type))
00015 {
00016   int num_entries;
00017 
00018   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d",name,&num_entries) != 2)
00019     fatal("bad fusion options string %s (should be \"multihybrid:name:num_entries\")",opt_string);
00020   return new fusion_multihybrid_t(name,num_pred,num_entries);
00021 }
00022 #else
00023 
00024 static const char meta_selection[2][2][2] =
00025 {
00026   {
00027     {0, 0}, {1, 1}
00028   },
00029   
00030   {
00031     {2, 3}, {2, 3}
00032   }
00033 };
00034 
00035 class fusion_multihybrid_t:public fusion_t
00036 {
00037   protected:
00038  
00039   int meta_size;
00040   int meta_mask;
00041   my2bc_t ** meta;
00042 
00043   int meta_direction;
00044 
00045   public:
00046 
00047   /* CREATE */
00048   fusion_multihybrid_t(char * const arg_name,
00049                        const int arg_num_pred,
00050                        const int arg_meta_size
00051                       )
00052   {
00053     init();
00054 
00055     /* verify arguments are valid */
00056     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_meta_size);
00057     if(arg_num_pred != 4)
00058       fatal("multihybrid must have exactly four components");
00059 
00060     name = strdup(arg_name);
00061     if(!name)
00062       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion multihybrid name (strdup)");
00063     type = strdup("multihybrid Selection");
00064     if(!type)
00065       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion multihybrid type (strdup)");
00066 
00067     num_pred = arg_num_pred;
00068     meta_size = arg_meta_size;
00069     meta_mask = arg_meta_size-1;
00070     meta = (my2bc_t**) calloc(3,sizeof(*meta));
00071     if(!meta)
00072       fatal("couldn't malloc multihybrid meta-table");
00073     meta[0] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(meta_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00074     meta[1] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(meta_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00075     meta[2] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(meta_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00076     if(!meta[0] || !meta[1] || !meta[2])
00077       fatal("couldn't malloc multihybrid meta-table entries");
00078 
00079     for(int i=0;i<meta_size;i++)
00080     {
00081       meta[0][i] = 3;
00082       meta[1][i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT:MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN;
00083       meta[2][i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00084     }
00085     
00086     bits =  meta_size*7;
00087   }
00088 
00089   /* DESTROY */
00090   ~fusion_multihybrid_t()
00091   {
00092     if(meta) free(meta); meta = NULL;
00093   }
00094 
00095   /* LOOKUP */
00096   FUSION_LOOKUP_HEADER
00097   {
00098     int index = PC&meta_mask;
00099     bool pred;
00100 
00101     meta_direction = meta_selection[(meta[0][index]>>2)]
00102                                    [MY2BC_DIR(meta[1][index])]
00103                                    [MY2BC_DIR(meta[2][index])];
00104     pred = preds[meta_direction];
00105 
00106     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00107     scvp->updated = false;
00108     return pred;
00109   }
00110 
00111   /* UPDATE */
00112   FUSION_UPDATE_HEADER
00113   {
00114     int index = PC&meta_mask;
00115 
00116     if(!scvp->updated)
00117     {
00118       BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00119       BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00120       scvp->updated = true;
00121     }
00122 
00123     /* update the top level meta-predictor when the outcomes of the two selected
00124        components disagree */
00125     if(preds[MY2BC_DIR(meta[1][index])] ^ preds[2+MY2BC_DIR(meta[2][index])])
00126     {
00127       if((preds[2+MY2BC_DIR(meta[2][index])]==outcome))
00128       {
00129         if(meta[0][index] < 7)
00130           ++ meta[0][index];
00131       }
00132       else
00133       {
00134         if(meta[0][index] > 0)
00135           -- meta[0][index];
00136       }
00137     }
00138 
00139     /* meta table for each set of two components only updated when
00140        those predictors disagree. If both agree, then either both
00141        are right, or both are wrong: in either case the meta table
00142        is not updated. */
00143     if(preds[0]^preds[1])
00144     {
00145       MY2BC_UPDATE(meta[1][index],(preds[1]==outcome));
00146     }
00147     if(preds[2]^preds[3])
00148     {
00149       MY2BC_UPDATE(meta[2][index],(preds[3]==outcome));
00150     }
00151   }
00152 };
00153 
00154 #endif /* BPRED_PARSE_ARGS */
00155 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
